titles.title: Art Thou Weary Heavy Laden (nice easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Art thou weary heavy laden Arth thou sore distrest Come to me - saith one And coming - Be at rest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hath He marks To lead me to Him If He be my guide In His feet and hands Are wound-prints And His side{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Is there diadem as Monarch That His brow adorns Yes a crown in very surety But of thorns{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If I find Him - if I follow What His guerdon* here Many a sorrow many a labour Many a tear (*Meaning "reward"){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If I still hold closely to Him What hath He at last Sorrow vanquished labour ended Jordan passed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If I ask Him to receive me Will He say me nay Not till earth and not till heaven Pass away{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Finding following keeping struggling Is He sure to bless Saints apostles prophets martyrs Answer - Yes{/lang-eng}
